verbose_text: In our previous study on C. erythraea, the application of MeJA for 5 and 10 days induced the accumulation of 2 (loganin), 5 (swertiamarin), and 6 (gentiopicrin), while no significant difference between non treated and MeJA treated plants in the amount of 4 (sweroside) and 3 (secologanin) was recorded [XREF_BIBR].
